00039 #include "RayTraceDialog.h"
00040 
00041 #include <QFileDialog>
00042 #include <QDir>
00043 RayTraceDialog::RayTraceDialog( QWidget * parent, Qt::WindowFlags f )
00044 :QDialog ( parent, f )
00045 {
00046         setupUi( this );
00047         connect( this, SIGNAL( accepted() ), this, SLOT( saveChanges() ) );
00048 }
00049 
00050 RayTraceDialog::RayTraceDialog( int numRays, double fraction, bool drawPhotons, bool increasePhotonMap, QString resultsFile, QWidget * parent, Qt::WindowFlags f )
00051 :QDialog ( parent, f ), m_numRays( numRays ), m_fraction( fraction ), m_drawPhotons( drawPhotons ), m_increasePhotonMap( increasePhotonMap ), m_resultsFile( resultsFile )
00052 {
00053         setupUi( this );
00054         raysSpinBox->setValue( m_numRays );
00055         drawSpinBox->setValue( m_fraction );
00056         photonsCheckBox->setChecked( m_drawPhotons );
00057         
00058         if ( m_increasePhotonMap )
00059                 increaseMapRadioButton->setChecked( true );
00060         else
00061                 newMapRadioButton->setChecked( true );
00062                 
00063         resultsFileLineEdit->setText( m_resultsFile );
00064         connect( this, SIGNAL( accepted() ), this, SLOT( saveChanges() ) );
00065 }
00066 
00067 RayTraceDialog::~RayTraceDialog()
00068 {
00069         
00070 }
00071 
00072 void RayTraceDialog::on_applyPushButton_clicked( bool checked )
00073 {
00074 
00075         m_numRays = raysSpinBox->value();
00076         
00077         m_fraction = drawSpinBox->value();
00078         m_drawPhotons = photonsCheckBox->isChecked();
00079         
00080         if( newMapRadioButton->isChecked() ) 
00081                 m_increasePhotonMap = false;
00082         else
00083                 m_increasePhotonMap = true;
00084         m_resultsFile = resultsFileLineEdit->text();
00085         
00086         
00087         
00088 }
00089 
00090 void RayTraceDialog::on_fileDialogButton_clicked( bool checked )
00091 {
00092         QString oldFile = resultsFileLineEdit->text();
00093         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName( this,
00094                                tr( "Save results document" ), "results",
00095                                tr( "*.dat" ) );
00096         
00097         if (fileName.isNull() ) resultsFileLineEdit->setText( oldFile );
00098         else resultsFileLineEdit->setText( fileName );
00099         
00100         
00101 }
00102 
00103 void RayTraceDialog::saveChanges()
00104 {
00105         m_numRays = raysSpinBox->value();
00106         
00107         m_fraction = drawSpinBox->value();
00108         m_drawPhotons = photonsCheckBox->isChecked();
00109         
00110         if( newMapRadioButton->isChecked() ) 
00111                 m_increasePhotonMap = false;
00112         else
00113                 m_increasePhotonMap = true;
00114                 
00115         m_resultsFile = resultsFileLineEdit->text();
00116 
00117         
00118 }
